IGraphics

Defines our basic rendering device.

IGraphics differs from IRenderer in that it is essentially just a wrapper around our underlying graphics device. It does not support things such as a scene graph, complex lighting (list of lights), or HMD support. Also, all rendering occurs on whatever thread this object is created on (versus marshalling the rendering over to a render thread). For those features, use IRenderer.
